violations.message: Document starts with performance data (explicit)

violations.evidence: Must compare to official prospectus benchmark. Confidence: 100%
violations.message: Performance shown without benchmark comparison

violations.rule_text: PERF_054: Mandatory performance disclaimer
violations.evidence: Required: 'Past performance is not indicative of future results'. Confidence: 0%
violations.message: Required performance disclaimer missing or incomplete: Past performance mention, Not indicative / not guaranteed, Future performance / future results

violations.rule_text: PROSP_001: Investment strategy must match prospectus
violations.evidence:
Strategy description: The prospectus describes the fund as 'actively managed' without further detail on the methodology. The document specifies a 'quantitative rigorous strategy based on momentum', a 'smart momentum strategy', a 'proprietary quantitative model', and a 'rules-based model' avoiding 'human bias'. The prospectus's description is too generic to confirm consistency with this specific quantitative momentum approach.
Investment thresholds: The prospectus states 'at least 70% of its net assets in equities which are constituents of the S&P 500 Index'. The document states the fund 'invests systematically in a dynamic universe of US companies from the S&P 500' but does not provide a specific minimum percentage threshold like 70%.
Asset allocation ranges: The prospectus mentions an allocation range of 'up to 30% of its net assets in the equities of issuers whose registered office is not located in the US'. The document does not mention any allowance for non-US equities; it consistently emphasizes a 'Focus on US equities' ('Focus sur les actions américaines') and investment in 'US companies from the S&P 500'. This implies a purely US-centric allocation, contradicting the prospectus's allowance for non-US exposure.
Geographic allocation: The prospectus allows 'up to 30% of its net assets in the equities of issuers whose registered office is not located in the US'. The document repeatedly states a 'Focus on US equities' and 'US companies from the S&P 500', and its Morningstar category is 'US Large Cap Blend Equities', suggesting an exclusively US focus without mentioning any non-US allowance. This is a direct discrepancy in the permitted geographic scope.
violations.message: Strategy presentation inconsistent with prospectus

violations.rule_text: PROSP_004: Must use official prospectus benchmark
violations.evidence: Required benchmark: S&P 500 Index (USD, NR). ONLY this benchmark allowed (PERF_016)
violations.message: Performance shown without prospectus benchmark or with wrong benchmark

all_violations.rule: PROSP_001: Investment strategy must match prospectus
all_violations.message: Strategy presentation inconsistent with prospectus
all_violations.evidence:
Strategy description: The prospectus describes the fund as 'actively managed' without further detail on the methodology. The document specifies a 'quantitative rigorous strategy based on momentum', a 'smart momentum strategy', a 'proprietary quantitative model', and a 'rules-based model' avoiding 'human bias'. The prospectus's description is too generic to confirm consistency with this specific quantitative momentum approach.
Investment thresholds: The prospectus states 'at least 70% of its net assets in equities which are constituents of the S&P 500 Index'. The document states the fund 'invests systematically in a dynamic universe of US companies from the S&P 500' but does not provide a specific minimum percentage threshold like 70%.
Asset allocation ranges: The prospectus mentions an allocation range of 'up to 30% of its net assets in the equities of issuers whose registered office is not located in the US'. The document does not mention any allowance for non-US equities; it consistently emphasizes a 'Focus on US equities' ('Focus sur les actions américaines') and investment in 'US companies from the S&P 500'. This implies a purely US-centric allocation, contradicting the prospectus's allowance for non-US exposure.
Geographic allocation: The prospectus allows 'up to 30% of its net assets in the equities of issuers whose registered office is not located in the US'. The document repeatedly states a 'Focus on US equities' and 'US companies from the S&P 500', and its Morningstar category is 'US Large Cap Blend Equities', suggesting an exclusively US focus without mentioning any non-US allowance. This is a direct discrepancy in the permitted geographic scope.

all_violations.rule: PROSP_004: Must use official prospectus benchmark

all_violations.evidence: Required benchmark: S&P 500 Index (USD, NR). ONLY this benchmark allowed (PERF_016)
